summary.span: 表示 或 ASP.NET 移动控件内的单个项。

span.span: Represents an individual item within a or ASP.NET mobile control.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虽然类名称为，元素名称是`Item`。Although the class name is , the element name is `Item`. 在移动的页上，你项使用声明[\<项 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79)元素。On a mobile page, you declare an item by using the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7152e195-e1d6-4a91-9dba-e0536a676e79) element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何操作中的项对象，通过类使用的选定的项的索引属性。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class by using the selected item's index of the property. summary.span: 获取或设置项中包含的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text contained in the item.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。
若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为空字符串或永远不会设置，或者以编程方式或通过构造函数，它将返回的值指定的列表项的属性。If the property is an empty string or is never set, either programmatically or through the constructor, it returns the value of the property for the specified list item. 属性可以通过使用指定`Text`属性，或为内部文本。The property can be specified by using the `Text` attribute, or as inner text. 如果属性指定这两种方式中，始终优先的内部文本。If the property is specified in both ways, the inner text always takes precedence. 但是，如果属性以编程方式设置，则会自动删除内部文本，并且已设置新属性优先。However, if the property is programmatically set, the inner text is automatically removed and the newly set property takes precedence.
